definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc

pinyin: xing4 bie2 ren4 tong2 zhang4 ai4

sentences.english: About gender and race differences in self-concept.
sentences.chinese: 自我概念上的性别差异和种族差异。
他说，“性别暴力仍在继续。

sentences.english: The operation of sexing to embryo affect pregnancy rate of sexed embryo.
sentences.chinese: 性别鉴定操作对性别鉴定胚胎移植妊娠率具有影响。

sentences.english: The operation of sexing to embryo affect pregnancy rate of sexed embryo.
sentences.chinese: 性别鉴定操作对性别鉴定胚胎移植妊娠率具有影响。

sentences.english: But what if gender discrimination is in fact happening?
sentences.chinese: 但要是真的有性别歧视存在又会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: No matter prize-winner nationality and sex.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者不论国籍和性别。

sentences.english: There are also transsexuals who oppose any sex reassignment surgery.
sentences.chinese: 也有反对任何性别指派手术的易性癖者。

sentences.english: The eternal question is whether this is just about sexism.
sentences.chinese: 这一永无休止的问题是，如此差距是否仅仅因为性别。

sentences.english: Compared with other social insurances, maternity insurance has evident sexual characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 与其他社会保险相比，生育保险具有明显的性别特征。

sentences.english: Policy-makers need to be aiming for gender-neutral policies.
sentences.chinese: 决策者需要致力于制定性别平等的政策。

sentences.english: Several studies have found that the answer to that question depends on the your gender.
sentences.chinese: 一些研究已经发现对这个问题的答案取决于性别。

sentences.english: South Korea created a cabinet-level ministry responsible for gender equality.
sentences.chinese: 韩国设立了专门负责性别平等问题的内阁部门。

sentences.english: Thailand will provide training for mass media on gender issues.
sentences.chinese: 泰国将为大众传播媒体提供性别问题培训。

sentences.english: The fundamental right to life exists regardless of one's gender.
sentences.chinese: 基本的生命权不论性别。

sentences.english: We all laughed nine Gao Fang Ma did not know the color and gender.
sentences.chinese: 大家都笑九方皋不认识马的颜色和性别。

sentences.english: However, the applications included no sex-based dosing recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 然而，该应用并未采纳性别区别用药量的提议。
